title: Science Fiction Action Music Pack
description: This is a music pack featuring twenty-seven unique science fiction instrumental tracks. Utilizing orchestral and ambient effects, all of these pieces are versatile enough to use across a wide variety of projects.
longDescription:
Music composer, Living Force is proud to present The Science Fiction Expanse Music Pack! This is an asset pack that contains thirteen orchestral instrumentals geared towards the world of science fiction. The pieces all contain a fade-out and are loopable for desired cut scenes, action sequences, and transitions for your projects.

 

The following instrumentals are included with this asset pack:

A River Crossing A Minor 1:12

A Tale Of Two Cities A Minor 1:35

An Inner Light Bb Minor 1:21

Battle of Europa F Minor 1:40

City In The Sky B Minor 1:08

Dark Matter C Minor 1:44

Escape Velocity E Minor 1:03

Ganymede G Minor 1:16

Gladiators Commence D Minor 1:56

Hero Of The Night C Minor 1:30

Ice Storms of Neptune A Minor 1:30

Journey To The Mountain A Minor 1:13

Knights Of The Castle E Minor 1:08

Neverland A Minor 1:36

Requiem F Minor 1:56

Rings of Saturn G Minor 1:29

Sentient Solitude A Minor 1:44

The Battle Barge F Minor 0:51

The Battle of Titans Bb Minor 1:28

The Emperor's Guard D Minor 1:09

The Enchanted Island D Minor 1:19

The Far Reaches of Space E Minor 1:21

The Hidden Passenger E Minor 0:53

The Rain Falls E Minor 0:52

There Goes That Ship G Minor 1:16

These Are The Voyages A Minor 1:16

Ursa Major A Minor 1:35
